docs.lead_paragraph: Kaiser Permanente announced  that its researchers had begun a study into the interplay of genetics, environmental factors and lifestyles that cause many common diseases.

headline.main: Company to Study Complex Roots of Disease
headline.print_headline: Company to Study Complex Roots of Disease

docs.snippet: Kaiser Permanente announced  that its researchers had begun a study into the interplay of genetics, environmental factors and lifestyles that cause many common diseases.

docs.lead_paragraph: Europe and California are taking the lead in imposing new rules for monitoring what is in perfumes, creams, nail polish and hair sprays.
docs.snippet: Europe and California are taking the lead in imposing new rules for monitoring what is in perfumes, creams, nail polish and hair sprays.

docs.lead_paragraph: FOR decades, companies that make everything from after-shave to lip gloss have conducted safety testing on grooming products and shipped the cosmetics to stores to be sold to consumers, all with very little government involvement. And over the years, there have been few health or safety problems associated with the myriad grooming products and cosmetics on the market. Nonetheless, momentum has been building for greater oversight of the chemicals in everyday products, with the European Union and California taking the lead in imposing new rules for monitoring what is in the perfumes, creams, nail polish and hair sprays that are sold.

headline.main: Skin Deep; Should You Trust Your Makeup?

docs.abstract: Momentum is building for greater oversight of chemicals used in everyday grooming products; European Union and California are imposing new rules for monitoring what is used in perfumes, creams, nail polish and hair sprays; cosmetics industry is already taking steps to heighten self-monitoring; no rigorous large-scale clinical trials conducted indicate that cosmetics trigger major diseases in humans; some small case reports suggest that a few substances used in cosmetics may affect human hormones; scientists are particulary interested in group of chemicals called phthalates, some of which have had effect on reproductive systems of lab animals; drawing; photos (M)
